core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Corporate Trust with Organic Human Connection
Emotion First: Trust, Clarity, and Insight
Content is King: Data tells a story
Zoom In: Focus on the nodes and connections
Negative Space: Let the data breathe

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Outfit'. Tight tracking (-0.02em). Bold or Black weights for impact. Never Inter.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Inter'. Relaxed line-height (1.6). Regular or Medium weights.

rules: Never use pure black. Use Slate 950 (#020617).
Orange is for ACTIONS (Buttons, Links) and ALERTS only.
Blue is for STRUCTURE (Headers, Nav, Backgrounds).
Ensure WCAG AA contrast for all text.

spacing_system.rule: Use 2x more padding than standard. Containers with borders MUST have p-6 or p-8.

marketing.name: The Tetris Grid
marketing.description: Asymmetric layout for storytelling. Mix col-span-8 (Hero) with col-span-4 (Detail).

dashboard.name: The Control Room
dashboard.description: Dense, data-heavy. Use col-span-2 row-span-2 for main charts.

cards.default: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-lg border shadow-sm p-6
cards.interactive: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-lg border shadow-sm p-6 hover:shadow-md hover:border-primary/20 transition-all cursor-pointer
cards.glass: bg-white/80 dark:bg-slate-900/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 shadow-lg rounded-xl

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

val_chat.layout: Split screen: Chat on right (30%), Context/Data on left (70%)
val_chat.bubble_ai: bg-blue-50 text-slate-800 border border-blue-100 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm shadow-sm

runa_map.style: Dark Mode Only for this component
runa_map.nodes: Orange for key influencers, Blue for standard nodes

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Outfit' font for all headings immediately.
Set up the Tailwind config with the custom colors (Slate 900 Primary, Orange 500 Secondary).
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar/Header structure.
Use the 'Control Room' grid for the main Dashboard.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
For the RunaMap, use a dark container even in light mode to make the graph pop.
universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use pure black or white.
